name: Trinity I - Near Life Near Death
description: Part 1 of the audio-visual triptych “Unholy Trinity”. Part of a wider series of aleatoric compositions entitled “Music For Liminal Experiences”. An original version is created each time the piece is started anew. No two versions are ever the same. Each composition plays endlessly, subtly evolving over time. This is an experimental artwork optimised for viewing and listening via google chrome.
